wiki_section_title: Filmography

wiki_section_text: 

intro: Achu Rajamani, often credited as Achu, is an Indian film score and soundtrack composer and singer. He has scored music for several Malayalam, Telugu and Tamil films. He made his music direction debut in the Telugu film Nenu Meeku Telusa.? in 2008.

qa.question: In 2014 , a title with Achu Rajamani in Telugu was what genre of film ?
